attributes.action: Frozen in uk:rents, water p, electricity p, p.Transport,council tax,sos services
attributes.additional_details:
For covid19 : 
Frozen all the bill ( water price , rent , council tax , make public transport free , electricity price ) that workers in uk can’t afford in this period caused form less work, so we can still decided to don’t leave the country and fighting together this virus.
attributes.background:
For covid 19
Frozen all the bills( water, electricity ,council tax ,public transport free and rent) that workers in uk can’t afford in this period caused from less work. So  we can still decided to don’t leave the country and fighting this virus together.
